name: Henry M. GREER, Appellant v. Michael SPENCER, Business Supervisor at S.C.I. Graterford, Thomas J. Rowlands, Record Supervisor at S.C.I. Graterford, David Diguglielmo, Superintendent at S.C.I. Graterford, Appellees

parties: Henry M. GREER, Appellant v. Michael SPENCER, Business Supervisor at S.C.I. Graterford, Thomas J. Rowlands, Record Supervisor at S.C.I. Graterford, David Diguglielmo, Superintendent at S.C.I. Graterford, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 17th day of November, 2010, the order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
8 A.3d 318
Henry M. GREER, Appellant v. Michael SPENCER, Business Supervisor at S.C.I. Graterford, Thomas J. Rowlands, Record Supervisor at S.C.I. Graterford, David Diguglielmo, Superintendent at S.C.I. Graterford, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 17, 2010.
